message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first because I think it could be really valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate further?

Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I understand your position, but $14,000 is really my bottom line.  This product is worth a lot to the right buyer, and I'm confident in its value. Do you want to meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still not able to meet at $13,000. Could we possibly find a middle ground at $12,500?
